<h3 id="X35622">X(35622) = HOMOTHETIC CENTER  OF THESE TRIANGLES: INVERSE-IN-CONWAY AND 2nd PAMFILOS-ZHOU</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a*((b+c)*b*c*a^4+(b^2+b*c+c^2)*a^5+(b^2+c^2)*b*c*a^3-(b+c)*(2*b^2-3*b*c+2*c^2)*b*c*a^2-2*((b^2+c^2)*a+b^2*c+b*c^2)*S*b*c-(b^2-c^2)*(b^3-c^3)*b*c-(b^2+c^2)*(b^4+c^4)*a)  :  :
